sentences.english: Her golden hair flared like the sun.
sentences.chinese: 她那金色的頭髮像陽光般熠熠發亮。

sentences.english: Cedar columns flare at their base as they prop up the Douglas fir logs overhead.
sentences.chinese: 雪松柱熠熠生輝地在支撐着上方的花旗松原木。

sentences.english: The turquoise stones gleamed brightly against the pallor of his palm as he spread the ornament before her.
sentences.chinese: 藍綠色的寶石在他蒼白的手掌中熠熠發光。

sentences.english: And old instruments often have a history that adds to their lustre.
sentences.chinese: 而古舊樂器又有着一段歷史讓其熠熠生輝，錦上添花。

sentences.english: The white - washed wall is brilliant against the dark-blue sky.
sentences.chinese: 寶藍色的夜空下，它的那垛牆漂白如玉，光采熠熠。

sentences.english: The policy meaning of resuming college entrance examinations is still glistening.
sentences.chinese: 恢復高考的政策意義迄今依然熠熠生輝。

sentences.english: The light of humanity shines brightly on this quality grounding.
sentences.chinese: 在這片質感的底色之上，人文的性靈之光熠熠生輝。

sentences.english: The diamond jewelry shines like the flowing galaxy.
sentences.chinese: 這的鑽飾，似銀河輕瀉，熠熠閃耀。

sentences.english: A water lily glows in the aquatic plants area of San Francisco's Conservatory of Flowers.
sentences.chinese: 一支睡蓮在舊金山溫室花房的水生植物區熠熠綻放着。

sentences.english: The water was a deep blue and sunlight glittered on its looking glass-clear surface.
sentences.chinese: 湖水澄藍，波平如鏡，陽光照在湖上熠熠生輝。

sentences.english: Shop windows display of goods dazzling, brilliant.
sentences.chinese: 商店的櫥窗裏陳列的商品琳琅滿目，熠熠生輝。

sentences.english: It's shining in the winter sunshine today.
sentences.chinese: 在今天冬日的陽光裏它熠熠生輝。

sentences.english: Czech drilling imaginative decorations, shoes shine.
sentences.chinese: 捷克鑽匠心獨運裝飾，鞋子熠熠生輝。

sentences.english: The star-studded cast on the red carpet is another highlight.
sentences.chinese: 而星光熠熠的紅毯又是另一個亮點。

sentences.english: You are the life of the party and your high confidence levels let you easily go up to hotties.
sentences.chinese: 你總是晚會的焦點而你的高度自信常使你熠熠生輝。

sentences.english: I feel my limbs are made glorious by the touch of this world of life.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得我的四肢因受到生命世界的愛撫而熠熠生輝。

definition: to dazzle/to brighten up (a room etc)
a glimmer/twinkling (of stars, phosphorescence, candlelight)/flickering light
to radiate/to shine/glitter of light/a glint
gleaming reflection of waves in sunlight
